attributes.action: Petition to have the Daily Mail blocked under the UK governments new ISP block to protect children and the rest of the population from it's stupidity.
attributes.additional_details: Since the UK government wants to introduce a new opt-out website blocking scheme to block websites which may harm children from being accessed inadvertently by children, I hereby propose that we make the first website to be blocked for the sake of humanity and the children under this scheme the Daily Mail, unfortunately accessible at www.dailymail.co.uk.
